Key Match Events: Derek Hill homered twice, and Kyle Stowers drove in a game-high four on three RBI knocks, as the Marlins outlasted the Rockies, 12-8, in Thursday afternoon's slugfest at Coors Field.
Pre-Game Insights: Manager Skip Schumaker emphasized the importance of Kyle Stowers adjusting to the league and finding his footing.
Post-Match Reflections: Kyle Stowers said he's feeling settled now and is proud of how he's adjusted to the league, with manager Skip Schumaker also proud of him.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Seven Marlins notched a multihit performance in the finale to split the four-game series, and the Marlins matched a season high with 12 runs and set a season high with 18 hits.
Others: The Marlins' hitting staff focused on minor mechanical adjustments like holding on to his backside and staying above and on the ball more for Kyle Stowers.
